data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 2, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Vinicius Goes of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 6, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
In the minute 11, Wellington Paulista of Fortaleza is pulled up for offside.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 14, Can Fortaleza capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
In Fortaleza Fortaleza attack through Juninho. The finish is off target, however.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Fortaleza.
In the minute 17, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 19, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Ceara throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 21, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Cleber Bomfim for the home team is judged to be offside.
Ceara's Fernando Sobral breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 23, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Ceara are whistled for offside.
In the minute 26, Free kick Fortaleza.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 29, Throw-in Ceara.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, David (Fortaleza) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 33, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Fortaleza.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 39, Romarinho for Fortaleza is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
In the minute 41, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Goal! Vinicius Goes gives Ceara a 1-0 lead in Fortaleza.
Charles instrumental with a fine assist.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Fortaleza.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
In the minute 45, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Ceara.
In Fortaleza, Cleber Bomfim (Ceara) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 45, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 46, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Ceara's half.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Vinicius Goes for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Fortaleza's Yuri Cesar misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Fortaleza.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Fortaleza.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 58, Osvaldo is on a sub for David for Fortaleza.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 60, Ceara drives forward and Samuel Xavier gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Ceara push upfield and Cleber Bomfim gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Fortaleza defence.
In the minute 61, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 66, Ceara are coming forward and Cleber Bomfim gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Charles for Ceara who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Charles has recovered and rejoins the match in Fortaleza.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
At Estadio Castelao, Vinicius Goes has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 71, Important block from the Ceara defence as Felipe fires in a strike for Fortaleza.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Ceara.
In the minute 71, Felipe (Fortaleza) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Fortaleza's Juninho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Ceara a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 73, The away team replace Yuri Cesar with Mariano Vazquez.
Franco Rodrigo Fragapane is replacing Juan Quintero for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 74, Franco Rodrigo Fragapane (Fortaleza) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Fortaleza's Mariano Vazquez has been booked in Fortaleza.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, The home team have replaced Cleber Bomfim with Rafael Sobis. This is the first substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
Ceara make their second substitution with Fabinho replacing William Oliveira.
In the minute 76, Fortaleza have a dangerous throw-in.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In the minute 78, Charles for Ceara has been booked by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
Ceara's Vinicius Goes has run offside.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Ceara needs to be cautious. Fortaleza have an attacking throw-in.
Vinicius Goes for Ceara drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 82, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a third substitution, with Felipe Silva replacing Vinicius Goes.
Tiago is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 84, Guto Ferreira is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Castelao with Manucho replacing Leandro Carvalho.
Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a fifth change, with Gabriel Lacerda replacing the possibly injured Tiago.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Free kick Ceara.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
In the minute 87, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in Ceara.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Ceara just outside Fortaleza's area.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Fortaleza.
Ceara drive forward but Fernando Sobral is judged offside.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Tiago Orobo is replacing Juninho for the away team.
